milestone_title: Secure participation of at least three key community leaders
milestone_description: Secure participation of at least three key community leaders

milestone_title: Obtain definitive response from ADEM on intent to issue TMDL
milestone_description: Obtain definitive response from ADEM on intent to issue TMDL

milestone_title: Release public report on sampling results and regulatory findings
milestone_description: Release public report on sampling results and regulatory findings

milestone_title: Host public forum with 50+ attendees to present findings and demand TMDL action
milestone_description: Host public forum with 50+ attendees to present findings and demand TMDL action

milestone_title: Secure voluntary remediation commitment from at least one industrial facility (if necessary)
milestone_description: Secure voluntary remediation commitment from at least one industrial facility (if necessary)

milestone_title: Develop and submit formal policy recommendations on TMDL approach (if necessary)
milestone_description: Develop and submit formal policy recommendations on TMDL approach (if necessary)

milestone_title: Finalize public access agreements with relevant landowners (if necessary)
milestone_description: Finalize public access agreements with relevant landowners (if necessary)

milestone_title: Conduct enforcement review and initiate penalties for non-compliant facilities (if necessary)
milestone_description: Conduct enforcement review and initiate penalties for non-compliant facilities (if necessary)

milestone_title: File legal action if ADEM has not committed to a TMDL (if necessary)
milestone_description: File legal action if ADEM has not committed to a TMDL (if necessary)

milestone_title: Complete project; open public access to Hog Bayou
milestone_description: Complete project; open public access to Hog Bayou
